        Parameters:
        nbThreads - is the number of threads
        nbSchedulableThreads - id the number of schedular threads
        uri - of the component
        managInboundPortPublisherURI - is the URI of the port connected to the Publisher (ManagementCI)
        managInboundPortSubscriberURI - is the URI of the port connected to the Subscriber
        publicationInboundPortURI - is the URI of the port connected to the Publisher (PublicationCI)
